tutorial.speak:
To add people to your Chums database, navigate to your Chums Dashboard.
The dropdown menu will show your options. Begin in People.
Enter the name of the person you want to add.
If the person has not already been entered into the database, the “Add a New Person” box will appear. Enter the person's first and last name and e-mail.
Click the edit pencil in the top right corner of the Personal Details dialog box.
Fill in as much information in the record as you like.
By default, the most recent 25 records can be seen.
To view all records, leave the Simple Search blank and click Search.
You can also add records by navigating to the bottom of the Recently Added People.
